THE FORD FOUNDATION
477 MADISON AVENUE
NEW YORK 22, N. Y
August 30, I960
Mr. Harry J. Skornia, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Thanks for your August 26 letter. I think it winds up the
report on the June 27, 1957 grant in good shape. No further inÂ¬
formation is needed.
I think you and your colleagues can be proud of the work you
have done in the professional development of education by television
and radio.
I am told that you will soon leave NAEB to join the faculty
of the University of Illinois. If this be so, I wish you continued
professional accomplishment and personal satisfaction in your work.
Sincerely,
fames W. Armsey
